attributes.title: Constant Calls
attributes.review:
I had to enter in my number to create this account. Now am receiving a plethora of phone calls about a variety of things, none of which I want to hear.
Additionally, I cannot support anything made, operated, or associated with Donald Trump or his family.
Little Donald should remove this app immediately from the app store as I personally found it useless, demanding information that I didn’t particularly want to enter, and also since it an app entirely dedicated to the campaigns of an impeached president; I found this overall highly disappointing (which was not unexpected).
I must reiterate on how I cannot support something made by Donald. He is a disgusting man and this app reflects his narcissistic behavior. There is no use for a campaign app; there are a number of other platforms that could be used for finding campaigns to not show up to.

If I could give this a 0-star rating, I would.

attributes.title: Killed my family and dogs
attributes.review: The most horrible brutal app ever!!! When I downloaded the app bugs came out!!! And I have a fear of any type of bug mostly the ones that jump or fly!! Theses bugs were brutal they killed my whole family and dogs😭😭😭 my grandma came trying to help out by trying to kill the bugs with a chancla but it didn’t work!!😭 so then Naruto came out of nowhere and used his rasengan but he also failed soon my house crumbled down and I lost my family and dogs and have nowhere else to live but in the streets😭 so don’t download the most horrible app!!

attributes.title: This app broke my phone 😡
attributes.review:
When I downloaded this app,I wanted to lear about the latest news about the country, then my phone started to get really glitchy, it turned off randomly, whenever I went in the app it kicked me out,
And I think my phone has a virus now. Not to mention I always fell like my camera is on and recording me, also when I went to Verizon to get my phone fixed, they Said that something seriously 
screwed up the software, and asked if I had downloaded any apps lately! This app is is the reason I had to get a new phone! DO NOT DOWNLOAD!

attributes.title: Not what I was hoping 🧚‍♀️✨☹️
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to see what our President was hoping to accomplish and unfortunately he has done nothing in the past 4 years that he promised. He was supposed to make America unified and great but now all I see is division and people at each other’s throats. He can’t even unify people during a global pandemic. This is very sad and this app did nothing to reassure me. 

This app also continued to glitch on my phone and gave me plenty of technical issues. Maybe he should use that “small loan of a million dollars” and put some more money into this thing.

attributes.title: This app killed my frog
attributes.review: This app is TERRIBLE and has caused great sorrow in my family. I downloaded it to see what all the boomers were going crazy about. Honestly, I don’t understand the hype. And ALSO! When I first opened the app my phone started seizing or something! The screen flashing with images of a scary orange man! I was scared out of my boots! I had my pet frog on my head as I always do and the moment he saw that scary man he too was terrified! He was so scared that he leap off my head and tragically landed on my cat, who ate him. My family is HEARTBROKEN and whoever that scary orange man is needs to GET OFF THIS PLANET! Rip Noodles you will be missed.

attributes.title: I have a dream...
attributes.review: I... an 18 year old woman was looking foward to see and experience these great app. I had a dream I could Go and find love in the trump world. I had a dream the app would work...I HAD A DREAM I could potentially download it. But it took 7 hours, and when I opened the app it crashed up on my feet. I will be lying if I said I didn’t cry. Because  i did... I wanted to see daddy trump in action. But I left with a broken heart  full of tears to give. I am disappointed and won’t vote for him no more. I had a dream of voting for you...but your app destroyed it as well as it destroyed my soul. Good bye daddy trump you won’t be missed.

attributes.title: install if you’re courageous enough 😈😈
attributes.review: As soon as I saw this was an app I thought to myself, “Woah! I have to get this app rn!!” Like any rational human being, I installed this app. Then after a little while I opened the app and to my surprise the first thing I saw on my screen was a picture of Donald Trump, now don’t get me wrong! He’s so hot and all 🥵 but seeing this as soon as I woke up was a BIG mistake!!! After using the app I decided it was very bad and don’t install pls 😭 this app hacked my phone and now I can’t play roblox and I can’t use tiktok anymore GUYS PLS DONT INSTALL but make sure to rate it 1 star!!!!!!!
